desc: Location filming is growing in popularity with the abundance of affordable cameras. You don’t need a studio, a broadcast truck, or even extensive knowledge of how to use a 16mm film camera–all you need is a digital camera, and you can take your job on the road and shoot wherever action is happening! This book will give you the knowledge and confidence you need to take your on-location shooting skills to the next level.
title: Better Location Shooting: Techniques for Video Production
